details.overview: 4-year undergraduate program offering excellent placement support with top corporate tie-ups. Includes comprehensive training on latest technologies like AI, Machine Learning, Data Science, Cyber Security, and Full Stack Development with hands-on practical experience.
details.eligibility: Passed 10+2 with Physics and Mathematics as compulsory subjects along with one of Chemistry/Biotechnology/Biology/Technical Vocational subject. Minimum 45% marks (40% for reserved category). JEE Main score accepted for admission.
details.scholarships: Merit-based scholarships available based on 10+2 percentage or JEE Mains score. Up to 100% scholarship through GUTS. National entrance exam scholarships also applicable.

details.overview: 2-year postgraduate program focusing on advanced computer science concepts, research methodologies, and specialized areas. Designed for students seeking higher technical expertise and research opportunities in CSE domains.
curriculum: Elective specializations in AI, Cyber Security, or Data Science
details.eligibility: B.Tech/BE in Computer Science or related field with minimum 50% marks. Valid GATE score preferred but not mandatory. Admission also based on GUTS or university entrance test.
details.scholarships: GUTS and GATE-based scholarships available. Merit scholarships for graduates with high CGPA.

details.overview: 3-year undergraduate program focusing on computer applications, programming languages, and software development. Ideal for students interested in IT industry without engineering background. Provides strong foundation in computer science fundamentals.
curriculum: Programming in C, C++, Java, Python
details.eligibility: Passed 10+2 from recognized board with any stream. Minimum 50% marks required. Mathematics at 10+2 level is preferred but not mandatory.
details.scholarships: GUTS scholarship up to 100%. Merit-based scholarships for high performers in Class 12.

details.overview: 2-year postgraduate program designed to provide advanced knowledge in computer applications, software development, and emerging technologies. Prepares students for senior positions in IT industry with comprehensive technical training.
details.eligibility: BCA/B.Sc. (CS/IT) or equivalent with minimum 50% marks. OR B.Sc/B.Com/B.A. with Mathematics at 10+2 or graduation level with minimum 50% marks. Entrance exam scores accepted.
details.scholarships: GUTS scholarships available. Merit-based aid for high CGPA in graduation.

details.overview: 2-3 year research-focused doctoral program for advanced study and original research in Computer Science and Engineering. Emphasizes innovation, publications, and contributions to the field through dissertation work.
details.eligibility: M.Tech/M.E. in CSE or related field with minimum 55% marks (50% for reserved). Valid UGC NET/GATE score preferred. Research proposal required.
details.scholarships: University fellowships and research grants available. UGC NET qualified candidates receive additional benefits.

details.overview: 4-year undergraduate program focusing on pharmaceutical chemistry, pharmacology, drug development, and patient care. PCI (Pharmacy Council of India) approved curriculum with emphasis on practical learning and industry exposure.
details.eligibility: Passed 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics (PCM) or Biology (PCB/PCMB) as subjects. Minimum 45% marks required.
details.scholarships: Scholarships available based on GUTS score or 12th standard marks. Merit scholarships for high performers.

details.overview: 2-year diploma program providing basic pharmaceutical knowledge and skills. Entry-level qualification for pharmacy practice, enabling students to work as registered pharmacists after completion and registration with State Pharmacy Council.
details.eligibility: Passed 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry and Biology/Mathematics. Minimum 45% marks required.
details.scholarships: GUTS and merit-based scholarships available. Special concessions for economically weaker sections.

details.overview: 2-year postgraduate program offering advanced specialization in pharmaceutical sciences. Three specializations available: Pharmaceutics, Pharmacology, and Pharmaceutical Chemistry. Focus on research, development, and higher-level pharmaceutical practice.

specializations.name: Pharmaceutics
specializations.focus: Drug formulation, dosage forms, novel drug delivery systems, and biopharmaceutics

specializations.name: Pharmacology
specializations.focus: Drug action mechanisms, clinical pharmacology, toxicology, and pharmaceutical testing

specializations.name: Pharmaceutical Chemistry
specializations.focus: Drug synthesis, medicinal chemistry, pharmaceutical analysis, and quality assurance

details.eligibility: B.Pharm with minimum 50% marks. Valid GPAT score preferred. Admission also through GUTS or university entrance test.
details.scholarships: GPAT-based scholarships. GUTS and merit scholarships available for B.Pharm graduates.

details.overview: 2-3 year doctoral research program in pharmaceutical sciences. Focuses on original research, publications, and advanced pharmaceutical knowledge. Prepares candidates for academic, research, and senior industry positions.
details.eligibility: M.Pharm with minimum 55% marks (50% for reserved). NET/GATE/GPAT qualification preferred. Research proposal mandatory.
details.scholarships: Research fellowships available. NET/GATE qualified candidates receive financial assistance.

details.overview: 4-year undergraduate program providing comprehensive knowledge of agriculture, agronomy, sustainable farming practices, and agricultural technology. Includes hands-on practical experience in effective farm management, crop production, and modern agricultural techniques.
details.eligibility: 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry and Biology/Mathematics/Agriculture with minimum 50% aggregate marks. Preference for students with Biology/Agriculture background.
details.scholarships: Available via GUTS or merit-based on qualifying exam. Special scholarships for rural students.

details.overview: 2-year postgraduate program with specialization in Agronomy. Advanced study of crop production systems, sustainable agriculture, precision farming, and agricultural research methodologies. Prepares students for research and senior positions in agriculture sector.
details.eligibility: B.Sc. Agriculture or equivalent with minimum 50% marks. Entrance exam performance considered for admission.
details.scholarships: Merit-based scholarships for B.Sc. Agriculture graduates. GUTS scholarships available.

details.overview: 2-3 year doctoral research program in agricultural sciences. Focus on original research contributing to agricultural advancement, sustainable practices, and food security. Specializations available in various agricultural disciplines.
details.eligibility: M.Sc. Agriculture or equivalent with minimum 55% marks (50% for reserved). NET/ICAR qualified preferred. Research proposal required.
details.scholarships: University fellowships and research grants. NET/ICAR fellowship available for qualified candidates.

details.overview: 5-year integrated program combining Arts and Law, approved by Bar Council of India (BCI). Focuses on constitutional law, criminal law, civil law, and practical legal training through moot courts, internships, and legal aid activities.
details.eligibility: 10+2 from recognized board with minimum 45% marks (42% for OBC, 40% for SC/ST). Any stream eligible. CLAT/AILET/University entrance test accepted.
details.scholarships: Merit scholarships and GUTS based financial aid available. CLAT toppers receive special scholarships.

details.overview: 5-year integrated dual degree program combining Business Administration and Law. BCI approved curriculum providing expertise in both corporate law and business management. Ideal for students seeking careers in corporate legal sector.
details.eligibility: 10+2 with minimum 50% marks from recognized board. Any stream eligible. University entrance test or CLAT score considered.
details.scholarships: GUTS scholarships up to 100%. Merit-based aid for high performers in Class 12.

details.overview: 3-year professional law degree for graduates from any discipline. BCI approved program enabling practice as lawyer after completion. Covers all essential areas of law with practical training and internship opportunities.
details.eligibility: Bachelor's degree in any discipline with minimum 45% marks (42% for OBC, 40% for SC/ST). Entrance test may be required.
details.scholarships: Merit scholarships based on graduation marks. GUTS scholarships available.

details.overview: 2-year postgraduate law program for advanced legal studies and specialization. Designed for law graduates seeking expertise in specific legal areas, research, teaching, or higher positions in legal profession.
details.eligibility: LL.B. degree with minimum 50% marks from recognized university. Valid CLAT PG or university entrance score may be required.
details.scholarships: Merit-based scholarships for LL.B. graduates. GUTS and CLAT PG scholarships available.

details.overview: 2-3 year doctoral research program in legal studies. Emphasis on original legal research, scholarly publications, and contribution to legal scholarship. Prepares candidates for academic positions and expert legal consultancy.
details.eligibility: LL.M. with minimum 55% marks (50% for reserved). UGC NET in Law preferred. Research proposal mandatory.
details.scholarships: Research fellowships available. UGC NET qualified receive financial assistance.

details.overview: 2-year postgraduate program designed to develop business leadership and management skills. Industry-oriented curriculum with 17+ specializations available. Focus on case studies, live projects, internships, and corporate interactions.
details.eligibility: Bachelor's degree in any discipline with minimum 50% marks. Entrance exam score (CAT/MAT/XAT/CMAT/NMAT/GUTS) required.
details.scholarships: Scholarships for meritorious students and entrance exam toppers. CAT/MAT toppers receive up to 50% scholarship. GUTS scholarships available.

details.overview: 3-year undergraduate program providing foundation in business management, entrepreneurship, and corporate practices. Multiple specializations available with emphasis on practical learning through internships, industry visits, and live projects.
details.eligibility: 10+2 from recognized board with minimum 50% marks. Any stream eligible but Commerce/Business Studies preferred.
details.scholarships: GUTS scholarships up to 100%. Merit-based aid for Class 12 toppers.

details.overview: 3-year undergraduate commerce program with honours, providing in-depth knowledge of accounting, finance, taxation, and business. Multiple specializations available including ACCA UK pathway for international career opportunities.
details.eligibility: 10+2 with Commerce stream preferred. Minimum 50% marks required. Students from other streams also eligible.
details.scholarships: Merit scholarships based on Class 12 marks. GUTS scholarships available. Special benefits for ACCA pathway students.

details.overview: 2-year postgraduate commerce program for advanced study in accounting, finance, taxation, and business. Prepares students for professional courses like CA, CS, CMA, and senior positions in finance sector.
details.eligibility: B.Com or equivalent degree with minimum 50% marks. Students from BBA/other backgrounds may be considered based on commerce subjects.
details.scholarships: Merit-based scholarships for B.Com graduates. GUTS scholarships available.

details.overview: 2-3 year doctoral research program in commerce, accounting, finance, or management. Focus on original research contributing to business knowledge, financial practices, and management theory.
details.eligibility: M.Com/MBA with minimum 55% marks (50% for reserved). UGC NET in Commerce/Management preferred. Research proposal mandatory.
details.scholarships: University fellowships available. UGC NET qualified candidates receive financial assistance.

details.overview: 3-year undergraduate program dealing with the application of scientific knowledge to investigation of crimes. Covers forensic biology, chemistry, digital forensics, and crime scene investigation with hands-on laboratory training.
details.eligibility: 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, Biology/Maths with minimum 50% marks. PCB students preferred.
details.scholarships: Merit-based and GUTS scholarships apply. Special considerations for students interested in law enforcement careers.

details.overview: 2-year postgraduate program providing advanced specialization in forensic sciences. Focus on advanced analytical techniques, research methodology, and specialized areas of forensic investigation with extensive laboratory work.
details.eligibility: B.Sc. Forensic Science or B.Sc. in Chemistry/Biology/Physics with minimum 50% marks. Entrance test may be conducted.
details.scholarships: Merit scholarships for B.Sc. graduates. GUTS scholarships available.

details.overview: 2-3 year doctoral research program in forensic sciences. Advanced research in specialized forensic areas contributing to criminal investigation methodologies, forensic techniques, and legal evidence analysis.
details.eligibility: M.Sc. Forensic Science or related field with minimum 55% marks (50% for reserved). NET/GATE preferred. Research proposal required.
details.scholarships: Research fellowships available. NET qualified candidates receive financial assistance.

details.overview: 3-year undergraduate program exploring political systems, public administration, international relations, and governance. Ideal preparation for civil services, policy analysis, journalism, and higher studies in political science.
details.eligibility: 10+2 in any stream with minimum 50% marks from recognized board.
details.scholarships: Available for meritorious students. GUTS scholarships up to 100%.

details.overview: 3-year undergraduate program in English literature, language, and linguistics. Develops critical thinking, communication skills, and literary analysis abilities. Opens diverse career paths in media, publishing, teaching, and corporate communications.
details.eligibility: 10+2 in any stream with minimum 50% marks. English as a subject at 10+2 level.
details.scholarships: Merit-based scholarships for Class 12 achievers. GUTS scholarships available.

details.overview: 3-year undergraduate program in psychology covering human behavior, mental processes, counseling, and psychological research. Foundation for careers in clinical psychology, counseling, HR, and social work.
details.eligibility: 10+2 in any stream with minimum 50% marks from recognized board.
details.scholarships: GUTS scholarships and merit-based aid available.

details.overview: 2-year postgraduate program in psychology with specializations in clinical, counseling, or organizational psychology. Advanced theoretical knowledge combined with practical training in psychological assessment, therapy, and research.
details.eligibility: B.A. Psychology or equivalent with minimum 50% marks. Entrance test may be conducted.
details.scholarships: Merit scholarships for B.A. graduates. GUTS scholarships available.

details.overview: 2-year postgraduate program in English literature and language studies. In-depth analysis of literary works, critical theories, and research methodologies. Prepares for teaching, research, writing, and editorial careers.
details.eligibility: B.A. English or equivalent with minimum 50% marks. Entrance test may be required.
details.scholarships: Merit-based scholarships. GUTS scholarships for high achievers.

details.overview: 2-3 year doctoral research program in various humanities disciplines including Political Science, English, Psychology, Sociology. Focus on original research, publications, and scholarly contributions to the field.
details.eligibility: M.A. in relevant discipline with minimum 55% marks (50% for reserved). UGC NET/JRF preferred. Research proposal mandatory.
details.scholarships: Research fellowships available. UGC NET/JRF qualified receive financial assistance.

details.overview: 3-year undergraduate program in hospitality and hotel management. Comprehensive training in hotel operations, food production, housekeeping, front office management, and guest services. Includes industrial training in reputed hotels.
details.eligibility: 10+2 from recognized board with minimum 50% marks. Any stream eligible. Good communication skills preferred.
details.scholarships: GUTS scholarships available. Merit-based aid for high achievers in Class 12.

details.overview: 1-year diploma program providing foundational knowledge and skills in hotel and hospitality operations. Fast-track program for quick entry into hospitality industry with practical training focus.
details.eligibility: 10+2 passed from recognized board. Minimum 50% marks. Any stream eligible.
details.scholarships: GUTS scholarships applicable. Special concessions for deserving candidates.

details.overview: 2-year postgraduate program for advanced specialization in hospitality management. Focus on strategic management, leadership, and contemporary issues in global hospitality industry.
details.eligibility: B.Sc. Hotel Management or equivalent with minimum 50% marks. BBA/B.Com graduates with hospitality experience may be considered.
details.scholarships: Merit scholarships for graduates. GUTS scholarships available.

details.overview: 3-year undergraduate program focused on food science, nutrition, therapeutic diets, and wellness. Prepares students to become certified nutritionists and dietitians with clinical and community nutrition training.
details.eligibility: 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, Biology with minimum 50% marks. PCM students with Biology also eligible.
details.scholarships: GUTS and merit-based scholarships available.

details.overview: 4.5-year professional degree program (4 years academic + 6 months internship) in physiotherapy. Focuses on rehabilitation, therapeutic exercises, and physical treatment of injuries and disabilities. Recognized by Indian Association of Physiotherapists.
details.eligibility: 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, Biology with minimum 50% marks. Some states may require NEET score.
details.scholarships: Merit-based scholarships. GUTS scholarships up to 100%.

details.overview: 2-year postgraduate program for advanced study in nutrition science, clinical dietetics, and public health nutrition. Prepares for senior positions in healthcare, research, and nutrition consultancy.
details.eligibility: B.Sc. Nutrition & Dietetics or related field with minimum 50% marks.
details.scholarships: Merit scholarships for B.Sc. graduates. GUTS scholarships available.

details.overview: 2-year postgraduate program with specialization in physiotherapy. Advanced clinical training and research in specific areas of rehabilitation and therapeutic sciences.
details.eligibility: BPT with minimum 50% marks and completion of internship. Entrance test may be required.
details.scholarships: Merit-based scholarships for BPT graduates. GUTS scholarships available.

details.overview: 4-year undergraduate engineering program in mechanical systems, thermodynamics, manufacturing, and design. Comprehensive training in core mechanical engineering with modern CAD/CAM tools and industry-relevant skills.
details.eligibility: 10+2 with Physics, Mathematics as compulsory subjects with Chemistry/Biotechnology/Biology. Minimum 45% marks (40% for reserved).
details.scholarships: JEE Main-based scholarships. GUTS scholarships up to 100%. Merit-based aid available.

details.overview: 4-year undergraduate program in civil engineering covering construction, structural design, transportation, and infrastructure development. Practical training in surveying, testing, and modern construction technologies.
details.eligibility: 10+2 with Physics, Mathematics, and Chemistry with minimum 45% marks (40% for reserved). JEE Main score accepted.
details.scholarships: GUTS and JEE Main scholarships available. Merit-based financial aid.

details.overview: 4-year undergraduate program in electrical systems, power generation, electronics, and control systems. Training in electrical machines, power systems, and modern electrical technologies.
details.eligibility: 10+2 with Physics, Mathematics as compulsory with Chemistry/Bio technology. Minimum 45% marks (40% for reserved).
details.scholarships: JEE-based and GUTS scholarships up to 100%.

details.overview: 4-year undergraduate program in electronics, communication systems, VLSI, and embedded systems. Focus on modern communication technologies, signal processing, and electronic circuit design.
details.eligibility: 10+2 with Physics, Mathematics with Chemistry/Biotechnology. Minimum 45% marks (40% for reserved). JEE Main accepted.
details.scholarships: GUTS scholarships and JEE Main-based aid up to 100%.
